title: ClassCastException when initalising expansion file with AndroidFragmentApplication
body:
#### Issue details
Trying to configure LibGDX to use [Expansion files](https://developer.android.com/google/play/expansion-files.html) via [setAPKExpansion](https://github.com/libgdx/libgdx/blob/9b8f20b2d0e96e53f0f2b98dc8f6131c810aae71/backends/gdx-backend-android/src/com/badlogic/gdx/backends/android/AndroidFiles.java#L127) when the application object inherits from [AndroidFragmentApplication](https://github.com/libgdx/libgdx/blob/9b8f20b2d0e96e53f0f2b98dc8f6131c810aae71/backends/gdx-backend-android/src/com/badlogic/gdx/backends/android/AndroidFragmentApplication.java) results in a ClassCastException. The setAPKExpansion method assumes that the application object inherits from [AndroidApplication](https://github.com/libgdx/libgdx/blob/9b8f20b2d0e96e53f0f2b98dc8f6131c810aae71/backends/gdx-backend-android/src/com/badlogic/gdx/backends/android/AndroidApplication.java). It seems like this could be fixed by changing setAPKExpansion to cast to [AndroidApplicationBase](https://github.com/libgdx/libgdx/blob/9b8f20b2d0e96e53f0f2b98dc8f6131c810aae71/backends/gdx-backend-android/src/com/badlogic/gdx/backends/android/AndroidApplicationBase.java) instead.

#### Reproduction steps/code
Create a LibGDX Android app with an application class that inherits from AndroidFragmentApplication.
After calling initalizeForView in the fragment's onCreateView method, call files.setAPKExpansion()

#### Version of LibGDX and/or relevant dependencies
LibGDX 1.9.6

#### Stacktrace
```java
java.lang.ClassCastException: com.mygame.MyFragment cannot be cast to com.badlogic.gdx.backends.android.AndroidApplication
                                                                          at com.badlogic.gdx.backends.android.AndroidFiles.setAPKExpansion(AndroidFiles.java:129)
                                                                          at com.mygame.MyFragment.onCreateView(MyFragment.kt:32)
                                                                          at android.support.v4.app.Fragment.performCreateView(Fragment.java:2248)
                                                                          ...
```

#### Please select the affected platforms
- Android
